Package cs236.lab2

Class Summary
DatalogProgram Converts Tokens created by a Tokenizer into Datalog structures.
Fact A Fact consists of an Predicate whose parameters are all constants.
Lab2 Creates a DatalogProgram from a file passed in and outputs it and its domain.
Parameter A parameter can either be an Identifier or a String.
Predicate A Predicate is the super class for the four Datalog types- Fact, Scheme, Rule, and Query.
Query A Query is a Predicate that can be evaluated against the Facts.
Rule A Rule is a Predicate with a list of Predicates.
Scheme A Scheme is a Predicate that has only Identifiers as Parameters.
TokenizerServer This class creates a new thread to parse Tokens into a Datalog program.
